##########
About Me
##########

I'm Jordan Edmunds, and wrote this as a Ph.D. student at the University of California, Berkeley. I have a set of tutorials on electromagnetics and other topics in electrical engineering on my website_.
.. https://www.learnelectricalengineering.com/
and a bunch of videos for people to watch on my youtube channel_.
.. https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEmBUvaW0UhAbPz4IiscKgw
If you like this content, and want to support me, please consider supporting me on patreon_.
.. https://www.patreon.com/edmundsj
